meanings.definition: To ask for something without intending to repay or return the favor.
meanings.sent1: He tried to bum a ride to the party.
meanings.sent2: She always bums money off her friends.
meanings.sent3: He decided to bum a cup of sugar from his neighbor.
meanings.sent4: The squirrel tried to bum some nuts from the bird feeder.
meanings.sent5: The student tried to bum answers during the test.
